item.title: Philosophy by Postcard: Iris Murdoch
item.description: In 2019 I contributed a ‘postcard’ to the Philosophy by Postcard-initiative to celebrate the centenary of the birth of writer and philosopher Iris Murdoch (1919–1999).1 The idea: anyone can send in a postcard with a (philosophy) question; others write in reply. The postcard I responded to, by a person identified as ‘Josie’, inquired about self-love. What is it? Is it even possible?
